definitions.definition: The acquisition of a controlling interest in a business or corporation by outright purchase or by purchase of a majority of issued shares of stock .
The use of grant monies to pay for another person to perform the usual duties , especially teaching duties, of someone engaged on the funded project .

main_definition: ( finance ) The acquisition of a controlling interest in a business or corporation by outright purchase or by purchase of a majority of issued shares of stock .
secondary_definitions: The use of grant monies to pay for another person to perform the usual duties , especially teaching duties, of someone engaged on the funded project .
